note.p: Physician. MD, Aberdeen, 1870. Resident assistant physician, Bethlehem Royal Hospital, 1870–2; superintendent, Male Department, Hanwell Lunatic Asylum, 1872. Out-patient physician and lecturer on mental diseases, St Thomas’s Hospital, 1878–1905. Secretary, Medico-Psychological Association, 1877; president, 1884. Co-editor, Journal of Mental Science, 1895–1911.
